okActionTest() - Method in class it.polimi.ingsw.model.MarbleTest
For each color (purple, yellow, grey, blue) this method tests the different cases when an action can be performed correctly (big/mid/small/special deposit that already contains the corresponding type of resource but there is still space and empty deposits without duplicates).
